name: It Moves With You
description:
Slide to the red goal.

WASD/Arrow Keys to slide

Click/Space to change perspective

No ending! It just loops 10 hand-designed levels for your entertainment

A prototype made for Global Game Jam and for the benefit of students in the Parsons School of Design Playful Prototyping class of Spring 2022.

Designed, developed, and produced in Unity by Jason Li with thanks to Charlie, Brianna, Laura, Kells, and Merry for their commentary and feedback.

The music is Debussy's La Cathedrale Engloutie as performed by François-Joël Thiollier.
